post.text: I hope when the MSM runs its "interruption counters" they consider the number of times the moderators interrupted me compared to #CrookedHillary!

comment.author: Cain
comment.text: Donald Trump For President..stay on target...keep using same level voice tone...you own this debate right now huge!...stay on target...and keep firing the facts at Hillary and calling her out...
